name: touitomamout
description: Touitomamout is a self-hosted personal assistant and reminder dashboard, providing widgets for notes, tasks, and quick links in a friendly, customizable web UI.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Organize information with customizable widgets for different types of content

features.title: Quick Notes
features.description: Jot down notes and ideas quickly with a simple note-taking widget

features.title: Task Reminders
features.description: Set reminders for tasks and to-dos to stay on top of your responsibilities

features.title: Quick Links
features.description: Store frequently accessed links and bookmarks for fast access from your dashboard

features.title: Customizable Layout
features.description: Arrange widgets and customize the dashboard layout to match your workflow

features.title: Personal Assistant
features.description: Keep track of daily information and tasks in one convenient location

features.title: Friendly Interface
features.description: Navigate a welcoming, easy-to-use interface designed for daily use

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your dashboard from any device with a responsive design
